settings.caption: Built to last
settings.heading: Reliable and Simple Control Panel
settings.text: Deliver consistent results with the easy-to-operate and maintain floor scrubber Scrubo Pristine 20. Help lower your labor costs and improve cleaning performance with the high RPM 500w brush motor.Â

settings.caption: Vancouver, bc, canada
settings.heading: Local Service
settings.text: Scrubo is a local business situated in Port Coquitlam, BC, Canada, with a focus on walk-behind floor scrubbers. By eliminating the middleman, we channel the savings directly to you, allowing end customers to save thousands of dollars. What sets us apart is not only our commitment to providing high-quality floor scrubbers at competitive prices but also our dedication to local service and support. This ensures that your floor scrubber can consistently operate without downtime, offering you a seamless and cost-effective solution.

settings.title: Brush
settings.text: 20" brush for hard or uneven floors

settings.title: Pad Driver / Pad
settings.text: 20" Inch Pad Driver and 20" Pad (This month special)

settings.title: Scrubo Pristine 20 Owners Manual
settings.text: Please download the most recent owner's guide, including initial assembly instructions, safety precautions, machine operation guidelines, storage recommendations, maintenance procedures, and troubleshooting tips.

settings.title: Empowering Your Business: Support at Every Step
settings.text: Our goal is to optimize your business operations for peak efficiency. Should you encounter any challenges with our floor scrubbers, we're here to assist. Feel free to reach out to us via email or contact us directly at 1-800-350-4840.

settings.title: Parts and Consumables
settings.text: Whether you're in need of replacement parts or stocking up on consumables, you've come to the right place. Simply email us with a photo of the part you require, and we'll promptly assist you.
